mapper.select: select * from reviewer where r_idx=#{ r_idx }
mapper.insert: insert into reviewer(r_idx, r_subject, mem_idx, mem_name, r_content, r_regdate) values(#{r_idx},#{ r_subject } ,#{ mem_idx },#{ mem_name } , #{ r_content } , now())
mapper.delete: delete from reviewer where r_idx = #{ r_idx }
mapper.update: update reviewer set r_subject = #{ r_subject }, r_content = #{ r_content }, r_ip = #{ r_ip }, r_regdate=now() where r_idx = #{ r_idx }
